title: Regression target pre-processing and displaying original target in decision_plot
body:
I'm working on [AutoML python library](https://github.com/mljar/mljar-supervised) and have an issue with the regression task. Sometimes the log transform on the **target** column is required before the training.  Then on `decision_plot` I have log transformed values. Is it possible to show original target values in `decision_plot`.

The example: https://gist.github.com/pplonski/95652f79886336e2fa781aad343f2399

The original target:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6959032/80601631-59ec2b80-8a2e-11ea-9a41-938cb4221fec.png)

Transformed target:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6959032/80601675-67a1b100-8a2e-11ea-9ad6-c623910a2505.png)

The `decision_plot`:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6959032/80601729-79835400-8a2e-11ea-8edf-232cc78df281.png)

Is it possible to show original target values in `decision_plot` ?
